archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0845
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to extract any stored business records by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services.

properties.value: to be able to extract all information about a selected business customer. It's not a specific format, but needs to be done directly from Comarch (chain of evidence)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
